channel.title: Ok, need some desprete help with a safe zone!
channel.description:
I have tried it all... Here is what I do...:
[code] || (absX >= 3175 && absX <= 3255 && absY >= 3505 && absY <= 3505)[/code]
I put the north west corner for cord 1 I put the North East corner for cord 2 I put the south West corner for cord 3 and I put.. The south east corner for cord 2.
I usually have to put both of the same cords for Y. I only get like 2 squares of Safe.. Man, I cant get it, I'd greatly appreciate it if someone can post something.

item.title: Ok, need some desprete help with a safe zone!
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

[quote=“Unknown Supreme, post:2, topic:232306”]Dont know if this is the same for your server as mine, but first X is southwest, second is northeast, then Y is southwest, northeast.

Example:

|| (absX >= southwestXcoord && absX <= northeastXcoord && absY >= southwestYcoord && absY <= northeastYcoord)[/quote]Thank you so much, you deserve rep.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok, need some desprete help with a safe zone!

item.title: Ok, need some desprete help with a safe zone!

had same problem before - where is it exactly?

item.title: Ok, need some desprete help with a safe zone!
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Supreme Unknown Supreme
item.description:
@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

Dont know if this is the same for your server as mine, but first X is southwest, second is northeast, then Y is southwest, northeast.

Example:

|| (absX >= southwestXcoord && absX <= northeastXcoord && absY >= southwestYcoord && absY <= northeastYcoord)

Read full topic

I have tried it all… Here is what I do…:

                || (absX >= 3175 && absX <= 3255 && absY >= 3505 && absY <= 3505)

I put the north west corner for cord 1
I put the North East corner for cord 2
I put the south West corner for cord 3
and I put… The south east corner for cord 2.
